<S%G2532>And<s%> when they come <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G58>market<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> they <S%G907>wash<s%>, they <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> other <S%G243>things<s%> there <S%G2076>be<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G3880>received<s%> to <S%G2902>hold<s%>, as the <S%G909>washing<s%> of <S%G4221>cups<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3582>pots<s%><S%G2532>,<s%> brasen <S%G5473>vessels<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2825>tables<s%>. pots: sextarius is about a pint and an half tables: or, beds

Greek: or, Gentile Greek: or, Gentile

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G5342>bring<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> one that was <S%G2974>deaf<s%>, and had an impediment in his <S%G3424>speech<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2007>put<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> upon <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> looking <S%G308>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, he <S%G4727>sighed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2188>Ephphatha<s%>, that <S%G3603>is<s%>, Be <S%G1272>opened<s%>.
